alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Saratoga; Schenectady (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:36PM EST until December 19 at 2:15PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mohawk River at Schenectady. * WHEN...From this evening to early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 221.0 feet, the North Ferry Street gage reads about 224 feet. Water is in the Stockade neighborhood between Ingersoll Avenue and Ferry Street. The area west of Erie Boulevard and south of State Street floods. In Scotia water approaches Schonowee Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:25 PM EST Monday the stage was 212.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 221.2 feet just after midnight tonight. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 220.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Mohawk River Schenectady Flood Stage: 220.0 Observed Stage at Mon 12 pm: 212.8 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 212.7 Mon 7 pm 216.9 Tue 1 am 221.2 Tue 7 am 220.6 Tue 1 pm 217.7 Tue 7 pm 216.2 Wed 1 am 214.9 Wed 7 am 214.5 Wed 1 pm 214.2 Wed 7 pm 214.0 Thu 1 am 213.6 Thu 7 am 213.3 &&
